config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
1. Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
2. Output of git diff from the initial commit.
3. Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. For files that have no changes, do not include them in the output. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt: create a well styled UI component that has a button which increments a counter every time its pressed. Make it centered in the page. Also add this component to the main page.
Whenever the count is changed in the component, make an API call with the new count to a backend API
Show a styled table with 2 columns and number of rows that is equal to the current count in the component
In the second column of the table, show the current date and time
Add another column that has an input box.
add a reset to zero button
Use Radix-ui react-icons library for the add button
add a yellow hover border on the buttons
add a cyan hover border for the buttons
add a blue hover on buttons
add a red hover border on buttons
